name: Bygone Blast
description:
You are an archaeologist who has discovered an ancient alien weapon in their expedition, setting off a cascade of catastrophic astronomical events you must escape from. 

Use your newfound trusty weapon to rocket your way through ruins to make it out as fast as you can!

(Feel free to post speedruns or playthroughs in the comments! Downloading the .exe will allow you to save your best times and progress. Plus theres a little secret for beating the game!)
